description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，汉族，中国共产党党员。曾任第十三届全国人民代表大会四川地区代表。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, of Han ethnicity, and a member of the Chinese Communist Party. She served as a deputy from the Sichuan region to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Sichuan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 13th term of the highest state authority in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本信息，王兆是四川自贡人。
description.en: According to the text, Wang Zhao is a native of Zigong, Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 王兆是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Wang Zhao is a member of the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年2月24日，王兆当选为第十三届全国人民代表大会四川地区代表。
description.en: On February 24, 2018, Wang Zhao was elected as a deputy from the Sichuan region to the 13th National People's Congress.
